name: vscode-kirby-toolkit
description: Productivity tools for Kirby CMS development: type-hints, Blueprint validation, and snippet navigation

kirby.autoInjectTypeHints.description: Automatically inject PHPDoc type hints when creating new template or snippet files

kirby.typeHintVariables.description: Variables to include in the PHPDoc type hint block

kirby.enableBlueprintValidation.description: Enable JSON Schema validation for Kirby Blueprint files

kirby.blueprintSchemaPath.description: Path to custom Blueprint JSON Schema (leave empty to use bundled schema)

kirby.showSnippetCodeLens.description: Show CodeLens links above snippet() calls for quick navigation

kirby.enableTailwindIntegration.description: Enable automatic Tailwind CSS integration for PHP templates

kirby.showBlueprintFieldCodeLens.description: Show CodeLens with Blueprint fields in template files

kirby.showBlueprintFieldTypes.description: Show field types in Blueprint field CodeLens

kirby.blueprintFieldDisplayLimit.description: Maximum number of Blueprint fields to display before truncating

kirby.showControllerNavigation.description: Show navigation to controller files from templates

kirby.showModelNavigation.description: Show navigation to model files from templates

kirby.enableBlueprintTemplateSync.description: Enable automatic prompts to create matching Blueprint/Template files

kirby.syncPromptBehavior.description: How to handle Blueprint/Template synchronization: 'ask' (prompt user), 'never' (disable prompts), 'always' (auto-create files)

kirby.syncCreateController.description: Automatically create a controller file when creating a template from a Blueprint

kirby.syncCreateModel.description: Automatically create a model file when creating a template from a Blueprint

kirby.syncIgnoreFolders.description: Folder patterns to exclude from Blueprint/Template synchronization detection

kirby.enableBuildIntegration.description: Enable build integration features for managing npm build scripts

kirby.buildCommand.description: Custom build command to run (leave empty to auto-detect from package.json scripts)

kirby.buildAutoStart.description: Automatically start the build watcher when opening a Kirby workspace

kirby.buildAutoStartScript.description: Which npm script to use for auto-start (dev, watch, or build)

kirby.buildAutoStartDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before auto-starting build watcher (allows project to load)

scripts.copy-schemas: mkdir -p out/schemas && cp src/schemas/*.json out/schemas/ && cp src/schemas/LICENSE out/schemas/
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
